item.title: 弗兰克-麦考特的自由计划组成财团竞购 TikTok 的美国业务
item.description: 企业家、前洛杉矶道奇队老板弗兰克-麦考特（Frank McCourt）周三表示，他的非营利组织自由计划（Project Liberty）正在组建一个财团，收购美国社交媒体平台 TikTok。【原文：Entrepreneur and former Los Angeles Dodgers owner Frank McCourt said on Wednesday his non profit Project Liberty is forming a consortium to buy social media platform TikTok in the United States.】

item.title: 杀不死你的东西让你更强大"，中国嘲弄美国的新关税
item.description: 中国对美国对从注射器到电池的 180 亿美元中国商品加征关税的举动做出了有分寸的回应，这表明世界上最大的两个经济体之间的关系面临着更多的霜冻，而不是一场新的贸易交火。【原文：China's measured response to the U.S. move to hike tariffs on $18 billion of Chinese goods from syringes to batteries suggests relations between the world's two largest economies face more frost rather than a fresh firefight over trade.】

item.title: NYCB 向摩根大通出售 50 亿美元抵押仓库贷款的交易达成后股价上涨
item.description: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）同意向摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）出售约 50 亿美元的抵押仓库贷款组合，该公司股价在周三盘前交易中上涨近 5%。【原文：Shares of New York Community Bancorp rose nearly 5% in premarket trading on Wednesday, after the lender agreed to sell a portfolio of about $5 billion in mortgage warehouse loans to JPMorgan Chase .】

item.title: 洞察力：埃隆-马斯克大规模解雇特斯拉超级充电站员工的内幕
item.description: 四名前充电网络员工告诉路透社记者，在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）上个月解雇特斯拉电动汽车充电部门几乎所有员工的前一天，他们对充电主管丽贝卡-蒂努奇（Rebecca Tinucci）与马斯克就网络的未来进行会谈寄予厚望。【原文：The day before Elon Musk fired virtually all of Tesla’s electric-vehicle charging division last month, they had high hopes as charging chief Rebecca Tinucci went to meet with Musk about the network’s future, four former charging-network staffers told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国 新股票记录跳过 CPI 枪口
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，马斯克的 Neuralink 公司多年来一直面临着细小电线的问题
item.description: 据五位熟悉此事的人士透露，Neuralink 公司上周披露，其第一位患者大脑内的微小电线已经脱位，而这是埃隆-马斯克公司多年来一直知道的问题。【原文：Neuralink's disclosure last week that tiny wires inside the brain of its first patient had pulled out of position is an issue the Elon Musk company has known about for years, according to five people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 关键通胀测试前期货持平
item.description: 周三，在关键的消费者物价数据公布前，美国股指期货变化不大，该数据将考验近期因美联储放宽货币政策的希望而推动的市场涨势。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were little changed on Wednesday ahead of the crucial consumer prices data that will test the recent market rally fueled by hopes of monetary policy easing by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 中国称 "霸道 "加征关税表明美国某些人已经失去理智
item.description: 中国外交部长周三表示，美国对中国商品加征关税的举动是 "典型的恃强凌弱"，"表明美国有些人已经到了丧失理智的地步"。【原文：The U.S. move to raise tariffs on Chinese goods is a case of "typical bullying" and "shows that some people in the United States have reached the point of losing their minds," China's foreign minister said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 卡塔尔航空公司首席执行官表示，波音和空客需要采取更多措施减少新飞机的延误
item.description: 卡塔尔航空公司（Qatar Airways）首席执行官周三表示，飞机制造商空中客车公司（Airbus）和波音公司（Boeing）需要向其供应商施加更大的压力，以减少新飞机的交付延迟，因为这种延迟阻碍了航空公司满足旅行需求的能力。【原文：Planemakers Airbus and Boeing need to put more pressure on their suppliers to reduce the delivery delays of new aircraft that are hindering airlines' ability to meet travel demand, Qatar Airways CEO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国参议员公布人工智能政策路线图，寻求政府资金支持
item.description: 包括美国众议院多数党领袖查克-舒默（Chuck Schumer）在内的美国两党参议员周三在讨论新的法律保障措施时，呼吁政府大幅增加人工智能研究经费。【原文：A bipartisan group of U.S. senators, including Majority Leader Chuck Schumer, called on Wednesday for a big jump in government research funding of artificial intelligence as they debate new legal safeguards.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商 Aiways 将通过与 Hudson Acquisition SPAC 的交易在美国上市
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商 Aiways 将通过与美国特殊目的收购公司 Hudson Acquistion Corp 合并上市，两家公司表示，该交易对公司的估值应在 4 亿美元左右。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Aiways will go public via a merger with U.S. special purpose acquisition company Hudson Acquistion Corp in a deal that should value the company around $400 million, the two companies said.】

item.title: 据《德国商报》报道，西门子将以 30 亿美元的价格向 KPS 出售驱动部门
item.description: 据商业日报《Handelsblatt》周三援引金融消息人士的话报道，德国西门子将以 30 亿欧元（32.5 亿美元）的价格向金融投资者 KPS Capital Partners 出售其 Innomotics 大型电机和驱动器部门。【原文：Germany's Siemens will sell its Innomotics large motors and drives division to financial investor KPS Capital Partners for 3 billion euros ($3.25 billion), business daily Handelsblatt reported on Wednesday, citing financial sources.】

item.title: 欧洲央行：人工智能在金融领域的应用可能需要新规则
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）周三表示，人工智能在金融领域的应用仍处于起步阶段，但需要对其进行监控和可能的监管，以防止对消费者造成伤害，并确保市场的正常运作。【原文：The use of artificial intelligence in finance is still in its infancy but it needs to be monitored and possibly regulated to prevent harm to consumers and ensure the proper functioning of markets, the European Central Bank said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 国际能源署下调 2024 年石油需求增长预测，与欧佩克观点差距扩大
item.description: 国际能源机构（IEA）周三下调了对2024年石油需求增长的预测，进一步扩大了该机构与产油国集团欧佩克（OPEC）在今年全球石油需求前景方面的分歧。【原文：The International Energy Agency (IEA) trimmed its forecast for 2024 oil demand growth on Wednesday, further expanding the chasm between it and oil producer group OPEC regarding the outlook for global oil demand this year.】

item.title: 日本最大银行 MUFG 第四季度业绩下滑幅度低于预期
item.description: 三菱日联金融集团（MUFG）周三公布的第四季度利润降幅小于预期，并预测本财年利润将略有增长。【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group (MUFG) posted a narrower-than-expected decline in fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, and forecast slight profit growth in the current financial year.】

item.title: Gamestop 和 AMC 在法兰克福大幅飙升，漫画股涨势如虹
item.description: 零售投资者的宠儿 GameStop 和 AMC Entertainment 在法兰克福上市的股票周三大涨，延续了本周的涨势，因为 "咆哮的凯蒂猫 "基思-吉尔（"Roaring Kitty "Keith Gill）发布了帖子，他是 2021 Meme 股票狂潮背后的核心人物。【原文：Retail investor darlings GameStop and AMC Entertainment's Frankfurt-listed shares jumped on Wednesday, in a continuation of this week's rally after posts from "Roaring Kitty" Keith Gill a central figure behind the 2021 meme stock frenzy.】

item.title: 随着最后期限的临近，必和必拓对英美资源集团交易的选择余地越来越小
item.description: 必和必拓集团对竞争对手英美资源集团（Anglo American）的收购方案包括：提高其427亿美元收购报价的甜度、提出敌意收购或在5月22日提出有约束力收购要约的最后期限临近时暂时放弃。【原文：BHP Group's options for its pursuit of rival miner Anglo American include sweetening its $42.7 billion buyout offer, making a hostile bid or walking away for now as it approaches a May 22 deadline to lodge a binding offer.】

item.title: 日本瑞穗第四季度利润大幅增长，预计未来将实现增长
item.description: 瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group）周三公布，受海外业务和国内贷款需求的帮助，该公司第四季度利润大幅增长，超出预期。【原文：Mizuho Financial Group reported a big jump in fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday that beat expectations, helped by its overseas business and demand for loans at home, and it forecast higher profit in the current financial year.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，美国警告 Raiffeisen 可能因俄罗斯问题而被限制进入美元系统
item.description: 据一位看到过信件的人士称，美国财政部曾书面警告 Raiffeisen Bank International，由于其与俄罗斯的交易，该银行进入美国金融系统的权限可能会受到限制。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International was warned by the U.S. Treasury in writing that its access to the U.S. financial system could be curbed because of its Russia dealings, according to a person who has seen the correspondence.】

item.title: 冬季预订量增加，TUI 第二季度亏损低于预期
item.description: 欧洲最大的旅游运营商 TUI 第二季度的营业亏损有所收窄，原因是其在北半球典型的冬季旅游淡季结束时的业绩好于预期。【原文：Europe's largest tour operator TUI narrowed its operating loss in the second quarter as its typically weak winter season in the Northern Hemisphere ended better than expected.】

item.title: 亚马逊网络服务公司计划在德国进行 84 亿美元的云计算投资
item.description: 亚马逊网络服务公司（AWS）周三表示，该公司计划到2040年在德国投资78亿欧元（84.4亿美元），专门为欧洲建设云计算基础设施。【原文：Amazon Web Services (AWS) said on Wednesday it plans to invest 7.8 billion euros ($8.44 billion) in Germany through 2040 as it builds a cloud computing infrastructure specifically for Europe.】

item.title: 安联集团第一季度净利润增长 22%，好于预期
item.description: 德国安联保险公司（Allianz）周三表示，受财产险和意外险业务强劲增长的帮助，该公司第一季度净利润增长 22%，好于预期。【原文：Germany's Allianz posted a better-than-expected 22% rise in first-quarter net profit, helped by strength in its property and casualty insurance business, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 印尼 4 月份贸易顺差 35.6 亿美元，高于预期
item.description: 印尼统计局周三公布的数据显示，印尼 4 月份贸易顺差为 35.6 亿美元，略高于预期，原因是该国进口额低于预期。【原文：Indonesia posted a slightly bigger-than-expected trade surplus in April of $3.56 billion, as the country saw smaller-than-estimated imports, statistics bureau data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 报告称冲突、高借贷成本阻碍了欧洲复兴开发银行地区的经济增长
item.description: 欧洲复兴开发银行（EBRD）在周三发布的半年度报告中称，两场战争和高昂的借贷成本削弱了欧洲复兴开发银行所覆盖国家的预期增长。【原文：Two wars and high borrowing costs have trimmed expected growth in countries covered by the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD), the bank said in a semi-annual report released on Wednesday.】

item.title: 市场持续低迷，蒂森克虏伯下调销售额和净利润
item.description: 德国企业集团蒂森克虏伯在三个月内第二次下调了 2023/24 年的销售和净利润预期，原因是钢铁部门的需求和价格下降，以及材料贸易部门的减值。【原文：German conglomerate Thyssenkrupp cut its 2023/24 forecast for sales and net profit for the second time in three months, blaming lower demand and prices at its steel unit as well as impairments at its materials trading division.】

item.title: E.ON 第一季度利润稳定，投资额增加四分之一
item.description: E.ON 周三公布的第一季度利润与去年同期相比基本保持稳定，并称投资增长了约四分之一，因为欧洲最大的能源电网运营商正在大规模增加电网支出。【原文：E.ON on Wednesday posted first-quarter profits that were roughly stable year-on-year, adding that investments were up by around a quarter as Europe's biggest operator of energy grids is massively ramping up spending on grids.】

item.title: 不管你喜欢还是讨厌，流行语股票又回来了
item.description: Meme 股票再次飙升，让粉丝们高兴，让反对者沮丧，也让华尔街看到，2021 年 GameStop 狂飙背后的社交媒体力量依然强劲。【原文：Meme stocks are soaring again, delighting fans, frustrating detractors and showing Wall Street that the social media force behind the wild GameStop rally in 2021 is still going strong.】

item.title: 早间竞价：鲍威尔的力量在美国 CPI 前提振股市
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 中国部分地区公用事业价格上涨，家庭再遭打击
item.description: 中国十多个城市的公用事业价格上涨可能会短暂地将全国通胀率从超低水平拉升，但最终可能会成为世界第二大经济体的通货紧缩力量，因为它们会进一步削弱家庭的消费能力。分析人士说，公用事业价格上涨会进一步削弱家庭的消费能力，最终可能成为世界第二大经济体的通货紧缩力量。【原文：Utility price hikes in more than 10 Chinese cities may briefly lift nationwide inflation from ultra-low levels, but could ultimately turn into a deflationary force in the world's no. 2 economy as they further erode the households' spending power, analysts say.】

item.title: 成功发布 SU7 后，小米成为中国第八大电动汽车新贵
item.description: 据行业数据显示，中国智能手机制造商小米已成为中国第八大电动汽车新贵，其首款车型SU7轿车4月份销量超过7000辆。【原文：Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi has become the country's eighth-largest electric vehicle upstart after selling more than 7,000 units of its first model, the SU7 sedan, in April, according to industry data.】
